name: PASSAGEWAY
description:
A small prototype run and gun inspired by the base raid stage of Contra for the NES. Destroy the orb at the end of the hall to progress.

Created in (under) 48 hours for BGSjam XVIII with Godot and Inkscape.

Controls

  • Start/Enter: Start Game
  • D-Pad/Arrow Keys: Run left/right
  • A Button/Z Key: Shoot
  • B Button/X Key: Jump
  • Escape: Quit
